description: This is a Python script for a command-line interface (CLI) tool that initializes various project templates, parses CLI arguments, retrieves project configuration info, and outputs JSON summaries or specific run commands.

methods.name: parse_parameters
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated key=value string into a dictionary with appropriate data types.

methods.name: create_project_config
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: create_minimal_project_config
methods.description: Creates a minimal ProjectConfig for retrieving template info, mainly for internal use.

methods.name: make_path_absolute
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a base directory.

methods.name: template_init_info_to_dict
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths for JSON serialization.

methods.name: output_json
methods.description: Outputs a JSON-formatted result indicating success or failure, including template info if available.

methods.name: output_get_run_command
methods.description: Outputs the run command for a specific project type in JSON format.

methods.name: handle_get_run_command
methods.description: Handles the --get-run-command CLI argument, retrieves and outputs the run command for a project type.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that parses CLI arguments, handles project initialization or get-run-command requests, and manages flow control.
